content: A British musician, born in the 1940s, who was a member of a famous rock band. His name is "Paul" what?

I think I know who you're talking about! Paul McCartney, right? He's a legendary British musician born in 1942 and is best known as a member of the Beatles, one of the most successful and influential rock bands in history. Paul McCartney has had an incredible career both with the Beatles and as a solo artist, and he's still making music today. Is that the person you were thinking of?
